> Well, I discovered the limit for mages.  When you get to strength 
 level 21934, any strength beyond that point is *free*.

I know you guys are going to love this.  After purchasing 25628 in 
strength of a thief, any strength beyond that comes free.  It only 
took about 1 hour to reach the limit once I had the money.
